|m=識

|md=sék

subSections.title: Definitions
subSections.text:
{{zh-hanzi}}

# to [[know]]; to [[realise]]; to be [[aware]]
# {{lb|zh|Cantonese|Hakka|dialectal Wu}} to [[recognise]]; to be [[familiar]] with; to [[know]] (especially someone)
# to [[appreciate]]; to [[recognise]] the [[worth]] of
# to [[distinguish]]; to [[discriminate]]
# [[knowledge]]; [[experience]]
# {{lb|zh|Buddhism}} [[sense]]
# {{†}} [[bosom friend]]; [[acquaintance]]
# {{†}} [[thought]]; [[awareness]]
# {{†}} {{zh-alt-form|適|[[just]] [[now]]}}
